plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and need sunshine to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a seed.
☀️ I like to be watered.
🌷 Flowers can grow on me!

plant.question: I am big and tall, with a trunk and many branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 Birds like to build their nests in me.
🍁 I can lose my leaves in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a vine. People like to eat me in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am a fruit, but people eat me like a vegetable.
☀️ I love the sun.
🌿 I grow on a plant that needs to be supported.

plant.question: I am a long, orange root that rabbits like to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🌱 I am crunchy and sweet.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers, and people give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My petals are very soft.
❤️ I am often red, but I come in many colors.
⚠️ Be careful, I can prick your finger!

plant.question: I am tall and have yellow kernels covered in green leaves. You can eat me off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Farmers grow me in big fields.
☀️ I love sunshine and warm weather.
🍿 I can be popped into a delicious snack!

plant.question: I am a type of grass that grows very tall. I am hollow and sometimes used to make furniture. What am I?

hints.text: 🎍 Pandas love to eat me!
🌱 I can grow very quickly.
🐼 I am used to make ladders.

plant.question: I am a seed that is dried, ground, and used to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 Farmers grow fields of me.
🍞 I am golden when I am ready to harvest.
🚜 I need to be harvested.

plant.question: I am a large, green vegetable with many layers of leaves. I can be used to make salad and other food. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits and turtles love to eat me!
🥗 I am often used in salads.
🐛 Caterpillars may be found eating me!

plant.question: I am a hard, round fruit with a thick husk and sweet white flesh inside. I grow on tall trees in tropical places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 Monkeys and people enjoy drinking my water.
🥥 I am hard to crack open.
🌊 I grow near the sea.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite food of a certain animal.
💛 I have a bright color.
✂️ You have to open me up to eat me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me!

hints.text: 🥛 I am often served with cookies.
🐄 A farm animal makes me.
🧊 I can be cold and refreshing.

food.question: I am red and round. I grow on trees and keep the doctor away!

hints.text: 🍎 Some say I'm healthy to eat daily.
🔴 My color is like a fire engine.
🌱 I need sunlight to grow.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny enjoys me.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten for breakfast, sometimes with milk and sugar.

hints.text: 🥣 You can eat me in a bowl.
☀️ I'm a good way to start your day.
🌾 I come in many different shapes and flavors.

food.question: I am made of dough, baked in an oven, and often eaten with butter or jam.

hints.text: 🍞 I'm a base for many sandwiches.
🔥 I need to be cooked.
🌾 Flour is my main ingredient.

food.question: I'm a fruit that is green on the outside, red on the inside, and has black seeds. I am very juicy!

hints.text: 🍉 I am a popular fruit in the summer.
🟢 My skin is a certain color.
💧 I have a lot of water in me.

food.question: I'm a dessert made of frozen cream, sugar, and flavoring. I am very cold and sweet!

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
🥶 I'm stored in the freezer.
🍨 I come in many flavors such as vanilla, chocolate or strawberry.

food.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you chop me. I have layers!

hints.text: 🧅 I have many layers.
😭 I might cause tears when you cut me.
🥗 I'm commonly added to salads and other dishes.

food.question: I am a round food, often eaten on a bun, with cheese, lettuce, and tomato. I am a popular sandwich.

hints.text: 🍔 You can order me at a fast food restaurant.
🍅 I often come with toppings inside.
🌱 I usually have meat inside of me.
